name: FunctionPoint MCP Server
description: This MCP server has various tools that correspond to different FunctionPoint REST API endpoints.

tools.name: estimates
tools.description: Fetches estimates from FunctionPoint with optional filters.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to start fetching from (default 1).

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Dictionary of key-value filters to apply when fetching estimates.

tools.name: dockets
tools.description: Fetches dockets (jobs) from FunctionPoint with optional filters.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to start fetching from (default 1).

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Dictionary of key-value filters to apply when fetching dockets.
